# Issue Response Templates

This folder contains templates for responding to common issues reported in the CoE Starter Kit repository.

## How to Use

1. Identify the type of issue reported
2. Find the relevant template in this folder
3. Copy the template content
4. Customize as needed for the specific user's situation
5. Post as a comment on the GitHub issue

## Available Templates

- [app-catalog-ui-blank.md](./app-catalog-ui-blank.md) - For issues where App Catalog or other Core apps display blank/incomplete UI

## Contributing

If you encounter a recurring issue pattern, consider creating a new response template to help maintain consistency in our responses.
